name: Level 1 title
__comment1: Layers are referenced in screen definitions. Put them here.
__comment2: Resources are used in screen definitions, and are pre-loaded. Put them here.
__comment3: Sprites are on-screen animated objects. Put them here.
__comment4: Your level can be split into 'screens'. Lay out the screens by defining them here.
__comment5: Name the screen that comes first in this level.
